title: (x) Church noticeboard geometric sans - various {gang}
content:
Hi all,

Three dimensional movable plastic type from a local church noticeboard. Exact matches arenâ€™t too vital - any vaguely similar faces will be appreciated!

Jez.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sundayservices.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061202015202/http:/typophile.com/files/sundayservices.jpg) | 260.44 KB |
author: baskervillain

comments.content: My first guess is Futura, but that B is definitely not Futura. Could be a rip-off, though, or simply based loosely on Futura-esque letters.

Other possibilities:

Century Gothic  
Neutraface  
Nobel  
Metro
